mapper.select: SELECT id, sector, title, content, file_id AS filedId, user_id AS userId, write_date AS writeDate, views, likes FROM community ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community (sector, title, content, file_id, user_id, write_date, views, likes) VALUE (#{sector}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, #{userId}, NOW(), 0, 0)
